manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HYDRATE TO THE MAX HYDRATE SHAMPOO Creamy, sulfate-free shampoo that deeply hydrates normal to thick dry, color-treated hair. HYDRATE CONDITIONER Creamy, luxurious conditioner that deeply softens and nourishes normal to thick dry, color-treated hair. HYDRATE SUPERFOOD TREATMENT Deeply nourishing treatment mask with essential nutrients that intensely moisturizes and softens hair. COLOR FANATIC Multitasking leave-in treatment with 21 benefits that primes hair for heat, detangles, protects from damage, and adds shine from root to tip.

Natural Ingredients + Aromatherapy Jojoba adds moisture, while Sage & Green Tea stimulate hair follicles & help support a healthy scalp. Made with a spa-like blend of Lavender, Bergamot & Patchouli to create a relaxing scent. Get The Best Results Enjoy a spa-like experience in your shower. Apply a dime-sized amount of shampoo to wet hair at the scalp. Emulsify into a rich lather & work down to the ends. Rinse. For extra cleansing, repeat.

WHICH PUREOLOGY RANGE IS RIGHT FOR YOU? HYDRATE Add to Cart HYDRATE SHEER Add to Cart STRENGTH CURE Add to Cart STRENGTH CURE BLONDE Add to Cart SMOOTH PERFECTION Add to Cart PURE VOLUME Add to Cart NANOWORKS GOLD Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,414 4.6 out of 5 stars 7,068 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,558 4.6 out of 5 stars 2,208 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,655 4.3 out of 5 stars 4,505 4.6 out of 5 stars 723 Price $74.00$74.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $50.00$50.00 HAIR TYPE Normal, dry color-treated Fine, dry color-treated Damaged, color-treated Blonde or highlighted Frizzy, color-treated Fine, color-treated Very dry, dull color-treated HAIR CONCERN Dryness, lack of moisture Dryness, lack of moisture Damage, split ends, breakage Brassy, yellow or orange tones Frizz, curl manageability Lack of volume, fullness, body Dryness, lack of shine BENEFITS Moisture and softness Moisture and softness Strength and softness Neutralizes brass Smoothness and frizz control Body and fullness Softness and shine KEY INGREDIENTS Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Keravis, Astaxanthin Keravis, Astaxanthin Camellia, Shea Butter Wheat Protein, Eucalyptus Leaf Keravis, Golden Marula Oil FRAGRANCE NOTES Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Raspberry, Peach, Water Flower Pear, Rose, Sandalwood Cocoa, Marshmallow Accord Pink Grapefruit, Wild Rose Dewy Pear, Ylang Ylang

Who is Hydrate for? Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner are for medium to thick, dry, color-treated hair. It works for all texture types ranging from straight to coily. What is the difference between Hydrate and Hydrate Sheer? We recommend Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner for thick to medium hair types since the formula is thicker and creamier. The formula of Hydrate Sheer is silicone-free and lightweight, so it is perfect for fine to medium hair types What is the main ingredient in Hydrate? The main ingredients in Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner are Jojoba oil, Green Tea, and Sage. The jojoba oil moisturizes the hair, while the green tea helps promote a healthy scalp, and the sage stimulates hair follicles. Is this good for curly hair? Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner has been tested on all hair textures and is an excellent choice for curly hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effect on hair - amazing
reviews.reviewText: Since I made the switch to pureology I have been loving it. I use the shampoo & conditioner in combination with the hair mask and my hair is soft, shinny and smells amazing! I noticed I can go 3 days without washing and a little goes a long way with this product also! My hair doesn’t look oily and feel strains after like most products. The price is worth it! I still have more than half the bottle left and I bought this a few months ago! The 21 benefits spray is amazing also! I love that I made the switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best shampoos.
reviews.reviewText: I can’t understand how they do it, but this shampoo makes my hair so soft and shiny, and no other shampoo can quite do the same. I am a repeat buyer!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smelled great and worked wonders om my hair, my stylist loved it also
reviews.reviewText: I read all the reviews and chose this shampoo based on positive reviews. My stylist was impressed with my choice and I was impressed with the results when she used it. A little goes a long way, and this lovely-smelling shampoo lathers richly and gets the hair very clean and easy to manage with no combing. It was wonderful on my colored hair. Rich and hydrating. My stylist says she has loved using it for years. I did not buy the conditioner but she recommended I do so, even though my scalp is healthy, simply because we are having such a dry and cold winter here in Alaska. So moe Pureology products for me! I am a convert! I was pretty easy to convince considering how pleased I was with the shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purology is hands down the best hair products in the market! I have tried them all, drug store, salon and they are by far the best quality, smelling, moisturizing, and all around best products for any hair type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prices but wrks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is my regular shampoo
reviews.reviewText: I like how it works on my poker straight hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only shampoo that works
reviews.reviewText: My scalp got burned 2 weekends in a row during the summer and ever since then I have had terrible dandruff and itchy scalp. I’ve tried a couple of different shampoos but this is the only one that really works for me. (Amika hydrating shampoo is good too). My only con is that is has a strong lavender scent (which I hate) but I just use a different brand conditioner and I don’t smell it after I get out of the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great on very fine hair!

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow! My hair is so clean!
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is excellent! I could feel the difference immediately. My hair is squeaky clean and there’s no residue. Smells like mint(kind of). Love it!!
I use this shampoo at the recommendation of my stylist. I have dry, highlighted hair and this makes my hair seem healthy and it smells heavenly.

I've had this particular product before but not for a few years. I was pleasantly surprised that it is still great value for the dollar. It smells refreshing and it's a great moisturizing shampoo for colour treated hair.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best hair care brands on the market!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely hands down pureology is one brand of shampoo to have in your rotation when it comes to shampoos. I will never revert to drug stirs brands after discovering the pureology range. This particular shampoo range (purple bottle) is fantastic for dry damaged hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It really is one of the shampoos I've used in years 😃 you don't need much of it to apply to your hair in order to get loads of foam, it smells nice and most importantly (for me) it does not rinse your diy of hair as much as other shampoos. It leaves your hair soft 💜
